short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enabling ChatGPT to see what you see

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT That is a convenient tool to enhance the way we interact with ChatGPT. As users ourselves, we often go back and forth between tabs copying and pasting text from other websites into ChatGPT, just for it to not understand the full context.

ChatGPT That sits on every website ready when you are. It lets you select a part of your browser tab and ask your question to ChatGPT. Simple and convenient.

Note: Selected portions of the screen are sent to ChatGPT, DO NOT ever send sensitive information!

How to use:
1. Move the ChatGPT That Icon anywhere on the screen
2. Double Click the Icon
3. Move/Resize the selection box to whatever context you want to send.
4. Ask away and press Enter!
